title: Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K [2024 Version]
body_html:
Key Features

The next generation of our most popular 4K streaming stick
Upgrade your 4K streaming experience with Fire TV Stick 4K—now powered by a quad-core 1.7 GHz processor for faster app starts and more fluid navigation. It makes getting to the good stuff even easier—all for an affordable price.

An ultra-cinematic 4K experience
From preliminary finals to premieres, experience it all like you're there with support for cinematic 4K Ultra HD. Experience vivid colour and brightness with support for Dolby Vision and HDR10+, immersive sound with Dolby Atmos, and smooth streaming with Wi-Fi 6.

Enjoy smooth 4K streaming in your home
Amazon's most popular streaming stick in the world now supports Wi-Fi 6 for smooth 4K streaming, with less interference from other connected devices. To use Wi-Fi 6, you’ll need a compatible router like the eero 6+. If you have a Wi-Fi 6E router, we recommend Fire TV Stick 4K Max. Fire TV Stick 4K works with earlier Wi-Fi routers, too.

Next level gaming. No console required
No matter what kind of gaming you’re into, Fire TV has you covered. Play games like you stream movies with Xbox Game Pass. Now you can stream hundreds of high-quality games with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate directly on your Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K. No console required. Play new games on day one, plus dive into legendary franchises from Fallout to Halo, and everything in between with Game Pass Ultimate. Just grab your favourite, compatible controller and download the Xbox app to start playing.

Find what to watch with Alexa
Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to take you to your favourite shows. Not sure what to watch? You can search by genre.

“Alexa, find action movies.”

Stream free movies, shows, and clips
Power on and start watching a world of free entertainment through ad-supported streaming apps like 9Now, 7plus, ABC iview, 10Play, SBS On Demand, YouTube and more. You can access over 125,000 movies and TV episodes without paying for subscriptions.

From smart home controls to smart living
Control compatible smart home devices right from your TV. You can press and ask Alexa to do things like show Live View Picture-in-Picture camera feeds without interrupting your show, check the weather, and stream music. And Fire TV is always getting smarter with new Alexa Skills and voice functionality.

Alexa Voice Remote with TV controls
Just press and ask Alexa to find, launch, and control content. Quickly get to favourite apps with preset buttons, and go beyond streaming to check sports scores and play music. Dedicated power and volume buttons control your compatible TV, soundbar, and receiver.

title: Sonos Sub Mini (Black)
body_html:
More exhilarating home theatre
Unlock your entertainment experience when you pair Sub Mini with Beam or Ray. The 5 GHz WiFi connection enhances audio transmission speed so you can enjoy films, shows, and games with high-quality sound reliably synced with your TV.

More mesmerising music
Never miss a beat and hear more nuance in every note when you pair Sub Mini with One or One SL.

Core power
Within the acoustically-sealed cabinet, dual custom woofers generate the full-toned low frequencies of a much larger subwoofer. Advanced processing further enhances the bass response.

No buzz or rattle
Both woofers face inwards to create a force-cancelling effect that neutralises distortion.

Better bass for your space
Trueplay™ tuning technology adapts the bass for the unique acoustics of the room so it never sounds harsh, muddy, or flat — even if you place Sub Mini next to the wall.

Hides in plain sight
Elegant and compact, Sub Mini blends in beside your furniture and easily fits under a desk or table.

Connects wirelessly
Sub Mini connects to your system over WiFi, so you can place it wherever it fits and looks best in the room.

Plug, add, play
Just plug in the power cable, open the app, and follow a few simple instructions to add Sub Mini to your system.

Easy control
The volume automatically adjusts along with your paired soundbar or speaker. Use the Sonos app to customise the EQ and change the bass level to your preference.

Specifications

Amplifiers: 2 x Class-D digital amplifiers are perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
Woofers: Dual 6" woofers face inwards for a force-cancelling effect.
Architecture: Sealed cabinet neutralises distortion and enhances bass response.
Frequency Response: As low as 25 Hz
EQ: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub Mini and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble, and loudness.
Trueplay: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes your Sonos system. Supported iOS device required.
WiFi: Connect to WiFi with any 802.11a/b/g/n 2.4 or 5 GHz broadcast-capable router.
Ethernet: 10/100 port for hardwiring to your router
Voltage: 100-240V 50/60Hz internal power supply
Operating Temperature: 0°C to 40°C
System Requirements
WiFi: Internet connection
Power Source: Nearby electrical outlet
Sonos app: The latest generation of the Sonos app running on a compatible device
Dimensions (DxH)mm: 230 x 305
Weight: 6.35kg

title: Sony Bravia Camera
body_html:
Connect the Sony BRAVIA CAM to your BRAVIA XR TV and enjoy television like never before. BRAVIA CAM recognizes where you are in the room and how far you are from the TV, then adjusts sound and picture settings so they're just right. This means audio - including dialog - is clearer and more immersive with picture brightness tailored to your viewing environment.1,2

Every picture, optimized to your position in the room
Detecting the distance between you and your TV, BRAVIA CAM adjusts TV brightness, so you’ll always enjoy perfect picture quality, no matter where you are in the room. A light and colour sensor in the TV optimizes pictures to light conditions for the best possible viewing experience.1,2

The ideal sound experience from anywhere
BRAVIA CAM follows you and your position, even if you are watching from the sides, then adjusts left and right sound balance for optimum acoustics. Wherever you are in the room, you'll enjoy the same sound quality as if you're sitting right in front of the TV.1,2

Hear voices clearly, no matter where you are
By detecting your viewing distance, BRAVIA CAM is able to adjust voice zoom automatically so you can hear dialog clearly. The volume of TV dialog increases when you move away from the TV and decreases when you get closer.1,2

Enjoy video chat with friends and family on the big screen
Catch up with your friends and family, on the big screen. Enjoy more fun by connecting your TV with BRAVIA CAM.

Easy to connect, easy to close
Attaching and detaching the supplied BRAVIA CAM to your BRAVIA TV is quick and easy. Use the camera cover switch on top of BRAVIA CAM to close the camera cover if you want more privacy at any time.

Key Features

Compatible with select 2022 Sony TVs – A95K / A90K / A80K / X95K / X90K / X85K / X80K

Enjoy video chat with friends and family on the big screen

Ambient Optimisation Pro recognises where you’re sitting in the room and automatically optimises picture and sound according to the room environment

Experience a new way to control your TV with Gesture Control. Change channels, adjust volume, and more simply by using gestures – no remote required


1 This feature is available on BRAVIA XR TVs – X90K, X95K, A80K, A90K, A95K, Z95K.
2 Other than video chat, other BRAVIA CAM features will be available via future firmware update.

• Helpful widgets: Stay informed with customizable Alexa widgets like Calendar, To-Do's, Weather, and many more.

From smart home control to smart living
Control compatible smart home devices right from your TV. You can press and ask Alexa to do things like show Live View Picture-in-Picture camera feeds without interrupting your show, check the weather, and stream music. And Fire TV is always getting smarter with new Alexa skills and voice functionality.

The most storage in a Fire TV Stick

Next level gaming. No console required
No matter what kind of gaming you’re into, Fire TV has you covered. Play games like you stream movies with Xbox Game Pass. Now you can stream hundreds of high-quality games with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate directly on your Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K. No console required. Play new games on day one, plus dive into legendary franchises from Fallout to Halo, and everything in between with Game Pass Ultimate. Just grab your favourite, compatible controller and download the Xbox app to start playing.

Over 350,000 movies and TV episodes
Enjoy favourites from Netflix, BINGE, Stan, Disney+, Prime Video, Paramount+, Apple TV+, 7plus, SBS On Demand and others. Watch sport live and on-demand with Kayo Sports. Plus, play millions of songs through services like Amazon Music and Spotify. Subscription fees and terms may apply.

Stream free movies, shows, and clips

Alexa Voice Remote Enhanced
Control your compatible TV, soundbar, and receiver with dedicated power, volume, and mute buttons. You can watch your favourite shows and movies faster with preset app shortcuts (app buttons may vary). It’s expansive control and easy navigation without juggling multiple remotes.

title: Hisense Laser Cinema PL1H 4K Ultra Short Throw Smart Projector
body_html:
Transform your home entertainment into a home theatre experience with the Laser Cinema Series PL1H ultra short throw smart laser projector. With an optimised range from 80″ to a giant 120″ screen the PL1H provides flexibility to fit your space and lifestyle. Packed with premium features, prepare to immerse yourself into cinema with the PL1H!

As models may vary from country to country (even though products may have the same model number), please check the specifications. This is the Australian model.

X-Fusion™ Laser Technology
X-Fusion™ technology utilises a precise source delivering sharper images, more natural colours and 25,000+ hours of entertainment.

Ultra Short Throw Technology
Place the PL1H just 42cm away from the wall to experience a massive 120inch image. With revolutionary Ultra Short Throw technology, the PL1H provides you with an incredible experience with minimal footprint, allowing you the place the unit right below the action.

80''~120" Projection Size
Utilising Ultra Short Throw Technology, the PL1H casts vivid images and vibrant lifestyles from 80” inches to a giant 120-inch. Just place the console at the right distance from the wall to vary the size.

2100 ANSI Lumens
Experience a vibrant and colourful picture with 2100 Lumens brightness. Enjoy a cinematic experience with vibrancy, like no other.
*Peak Brightness

High Dynamic Range
High Dynamic Range (HDR) opens up a whole new range of colours and contrast, so you can enjoy a stunningly vibrant picture with incredible depth and rich details.

4K Resolution
The 4K Ultra HD PL1H utilises over 8 million pixels to create a whole new world the cinema sized screen. Images appear sharper, brighter and in their true colours – just as the director intended.

Dolby Vision · Atmos
Enjoy an authentic movie experience with cinema’s leading technologies. Dolby Vision HDR dynamically optimises colour, contrast and brightness, so you can watch each scene as the creator intended. And with the sensation of sound moving all around and above you, Dolby Atmos helps you feel like you’re right inside the action.

Filmmaker Mode
Watch your movies and TV shows the way the filmmaker intended. Filmmaker Mode enables a more cinematic experience on your Hisense TV by presenting a pure, clean expression and original calibration from the director.

Game Mode
Game Mode brings next-gen gaming features with Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM). When an external game console is connected to the PL1H via HDMI, Game Mode automatically activates giving you the best gaming performance and super fast latency.

Low Blue Light Design
Watch comfortably, with no eyestrain or fatigue. The image you see from the PL1 laser is reflected instead of being lit directly into the eyes, which is consistent with human visual perception. Now your eyes can stay comfortable even after long viewing sessions.

Voice Control
You can conveniently speak out to your Hisense TV remote at a distance of up to 3 meters or alternatively by pressing the voice command button.

Key Features

Laser 4K Ultra Short Throw Projector, up to 120" Screen Size

2100 ANSI Lumens - Experience a vibrant and colour picture with 2100 ANSI Lumens

VIDAA Smart TV - Enjoy Smart TV experience and Free-to-Air TV (built in TV Tuner)

Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos - Enjoy an authentic movie experience with cinema’s leading technologies

Voice Control - Hands-free voice remote for easier operations

title: Vogel's TVM 5445 32-65" ELITE Full Motion+ TV Wall Mount (White)
body_html:
Full-motion, ultra-slim TV wall mount for high-end TVs from 32 to 65 inches
With the elegant ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mount, you're choosing design and performance. The wall mount is specially designed for TVs from 32 to 65 inches in size and weighing up to 35 kg, and can be turned up to 180°, allowing you to optimally enjoy your TV from any corner in the room. In the starting position, there is only 4 cm between the TV and the wall. Available in White and Platinum Grey colours.

Ultra-slim design, ultimate enjoyment
The ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mount is the slimmest TV wall mount in our range, yet still offers an enormous weight-bearing capacity. As such, the ELITE Full-Motion+ is the ideal TV wall mount for large high-end TVs, such as OLED and QLED TVs.

Enjoy your TV from any angle
With the ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mount, you can enjoy your TV from any angle. The wall mount has extra-long support arms of 56 cm. Depending on the display size, you can turn your TV up to 90° to the left and right. And thanks to OneFinger™ Movement, you can effortlessly turn your display to the desired viewing angle with just one finger. A tilt function has been omitted because it is best not to tilt large, fragile displays.

Perfection in every respect
ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mounts feature 2D Leveling™, which allows you to mount your TV perfectly straight, both horizontally and vertically, even after installation. And perfection also applies to the finishing touches of the wall mounts. For example, the unique Cable Inlay System (CIS®) guides the cables through the support arms, with special holders to neatly conceal the cables at the back. All technical details of the TV wall mount are nicely hidden behind stylish cover plates.

Safety first
Every ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mount meets the strictest safety requirements, is TUV-certified and is tested to three times its maximum weight capacity. To minimise the chance of damaging your thin, fragile display, you cannot tilt the ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mount.

Installation made easy
The ELITE Full-Motion+ TV wall mount is easy to install, thanks to the included Quick Install Guide with explanation. Need more help? A detailed manual is available online, plus an installation video. A spirit level, drilling template, screws and fischer® DuoPower plugs are included. Plus, the free Vogel's DrillRight™ AR app makes it easy to mark out the first drill hole. Soft patches on the wall mount protect the back of your TV during mounting.

Key Features

Smooth one finger movement

2D levelling keeps TV level at all times

Up to 180° swivel

Supports max VESA hole patterns of 400 x 400mm

Ultra slim (40mm from wall) and strong, supporting max 35kg

title: TCL 65" C745 4K Ultra HD QLED Google TV [2023]
body_html:
Ultra-High Definition (UHD) Clarity
With four times the resolution of Full HD viewing, 4K delivers an incredible upgrade in detail and clarity. Enjoy all your viewing and gaming with stunning sharpness and definition. Keep up with the growing trend of UHD movie, show, and game development.

The Future of TV
Experience stunning picture quality and colour accuracy with Quantum Dot technology. Using a layer of light-emitting nanocrystals to enhance backlight colour, Quantum Dot TVs offer a more realistic viewing experience with richer and more vibrant colours.

Precision Backlight Brightness Control
Precision lighting control delivers enhanced brightness and uniformity across the screen. Enjoy increased contrast ratios, better blacks and a boost to overall colour and picture quality.

Perfect Viewing Every Time
Taking the contrasting technology of Dolby Vision, Dolby Vision IQ automatically adjusts for perfect visuals based on the unique lighting of your home theatre environment. Enhancing colour vibrancy through deeper blacks, and customising brightness for a premium display of content, day or night.

Cinema-Quality at Home
Experience the ultimate in cinema-quality entertainment. TCL’s Imax Enhanced TVs meet strict performance standards for certification and enjoy exceptional colour, contrast, and clarity, combined with immersive sound. Get fully immersed in the action and see films in a whole new way.

Theatrical sound enjoyment
Experience sports, movies and games like never before with Dolby Atmos. This immersive audio technology creates crystal-clear precision that transports you to the heart of the action. Hear every roar, rev and explosion around you, and get closer to the entertainment you love with Dolby Atmos.

Gamebar
Experience next-level gaming with the best enhancing technology in action. Unlock advanced display settings and modes on the go with the TCL GameBar.

Auto Low Latency Mode
Unlock your gaming potential with Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM). Enjoy a smooth and responsive gaming experience with minimised input lag, giving you the edge in fast-paced action and immersive RPGs. Discover the ultimate gaming experience with TCL's low input lag and quick response times.

No Limits. No Compromises. All Gaming.
Experience smooth and uninterrupted gaming with Variable Refresh Rate and Freesync Premium Pro technology. Eliminate screen tearing and stutter with the powerful 144Hz Variable Refresh Rate and stay focused on the action with crystal-clear visuals.1

It Perceives, It Thinks, It Produces.
Prepare to be captivated by stunning visuals brought to you by the new TCL AiPQ Processor 3.0. With innovative Ai-Picture technology, experience exceptional contrast, clarity, and vibrant colours, as well as silky-smooth motion. You'll be amazed by the lifelike images that leap off the screen. Get ready a world of stunning visuals will leave you spellbound.

Entertainment Hub
Step into a world where your favourite content comes together for easy access. Quench your entertainment thirst by navigating through an expansive library of titles or exploring the vast selection of movies and TV shows on Netflix and Stan, all from the comfort of your Smart TV.2

Key Features

65" 4K Ultra HD Resolution QLED Full Array display with Quantum Dot colour technology

200 Clear Motion Rate with 144Hz VRR

Smart TV powered by Google TV and Google Assistant Built-in

AiPQ Processor 3.0 cleverly optimising your picture

Delivering three-dimensional audio with Dolby Atmos

Unlock advanced display settings and modes on the go with the TCL GameBar

AMD FreeSync Premium Pro technology

TÜV Low Blue Light

1. PC graphics card must be able to output 144Hz.
2. Google account and internet connection required. Data usage charges and subscription charges may apply. Applications are provided, operated and maintained by 3rd party providers. Applications may vary by region and are subject to change without notification. Selected apps are available through Google Play Store.

title: Vogel's TVM 5605 40-100" ELITE Fixed TV Wall Mount
body_html:
Extremely flat TV wall mount for high-end TVs from 40 to 100 inches
This ultra-slim ELITE Fixed TV wall mount is specially designed to mount your large, premium TV as flat as possible on the wall. It is suitable for screens from 40 to 100 inches in size and weighing up to 100 kg, leaving only 1.5 cm between your TV and the wall. The ELITE Fixed TV wall mount cannot be turned or tilted, making this a dream wall mount for those who sit directly in front of the screen.

Unparalleled design for ultimate enjoyment
With the ELITE Fixed TV wall mount, you're choosing quality and unmatched design from the slimmest wall mount in our range. The load-bearing capacity is unprecedented. ELITE Fixed is the ultimate TV wall mount for very large, high-end TVs, such as OLED and QLED TVs.

Your valuable TV couldn't be more secure
ELITE Fixed TV wall mounts meet the highest safety requirements. They are tested to no less than three times their maximum weight capacity and are therefore TüV certified. In addition, ELITE Fixed TV wall mounts feature the unique Auto-ClickLoc™ safety system, locking your TV securely in place with a simple, audible click. Plus, soft patches on the wall mount protect the back of your TV during mounting.

Smart extras
The ELITE Fixed TV wall mount offers smart extras like a built-in spirit level to mount your TV perfectly straight, and integrated cable clips to hide your cables neatly behind your TV.

Vogel's makes installation easy
Installing the ELITE Fixed TV wall mount is easy. It comes with a Quick Install Guide, which explains everything clearly. You can also consult the detailed online manual or watch the installation video. A drilling template, screws and fischer® DuoPower plugs are included. With our free DrillRight™ AR App, you can easily mark out the first drill hole.

Key Features

Easily secure TV with Auto-ClickLoc™

Integrated cable clips for cable organisation

Slim style wall mounting only 15mm off the wall

Supports max VESA hole patterns of 600 x 400

Supports TV's up to 100kg

title: Sonos Ray Soundbar (Black)
body_html:
Upgrade your TV, music, and gaming experiences with this impressively compact and easy-to-use soundbar. Experience precisely balanced sound, including crisp dialogue and solid bass, plus streamlined control with your TV remote, the Sonos app, Apple AirPlay 2, and more.

Impressive Sound
Experience clearer, more powerful audio than ever before possible by a small standalone soundbar. Ray delivers precisely balanced sound, including solid bass and crisp dialogue so you’ll never miss a word.

Jam-Packed with Innovation
Asymmetric waveguides project sound from wall-to-wall and advanced processing accurately positions elements throughout your room. A proprietary bass reflex system provides thrilling lows with perfectly weighted bass, while custom acoustics precisely harmonise mid and high-range frequencies.

Tuned to Perfection
Like all Sonos products, Ray was tuned by leading Hollywood sound engineers. Trueplay adapts the sound for your space so content always sounds just the way it should.

Crisp dialogue
Never miss a word thanks to fine-tuning by leading Hollywood sound engineers and Trueplay software that adapts the sound for the unique acoustics of your space. For even greater clarity, turn on the Speech Enhancement setting in the Sonos app.

Compact, Versatile Design
Ray features an understated tapered design that blends into your home. With a compact size and forward-facing acoustic components you can neatly tuck it inside a media stand without sound interference from nearby surfaces.

Simple Set-Up and Control
Go from unboxing to incredible sound in minutes. Ray’s optical cable connects to virtually any TV and even offers a simple upgrade for computer gaming.

Expand Your System
Ray offers the flexibility to create the Sonos system you want over time. Add a pair of Ones to your home cinema setup for surround sound or other Sonos speakers throughout your home for multi-room listening.

Key Features

Four Class-D digital amplifiers

Two full-range woofers ensure you’ll hear the faithful playback of mid-range vocal frequencies plus deep, rich bass

Two tweeters create crisp high frequencies and clear dialogue

Zero-stress setup

Adjustable EQ

Works with AirPlay 2 on Apple devices iOS 11.4 and higher

Wi-Fi2.4 GHz 802.11/b/g/n

TV remote sync

body_html:
Overview

The Denon DHT-S218 is a slender sound bar featuring two powerful built-in, down-firing subwoofers and Dolby Atmos to create a powerful home theater experience without a separate subwoofer. Now stream with low latency and higher quality sound via Bluetooth LE Audio.

Key Features

3D audio with Dolby Atmos
Dolby Atmos delivers spectacular, immersive 3D audio for the perfect cinema experience. Enjoy enhanced bass, crystal-clear dialogue, and enveloping sound.

Full-range audio
With two built-in, down-firing subwoofers, dual mid-range drivers, and tweeters, you enjoy an amazing movie and TV show audio experience when you upgrade to Denon premium-quality sound.

Wireless music streaming
Easily stream your favorite music directly from your smart device to your sound bar via Bluetooth.

Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) Audio
Pair your smartphone or tablet with the DHT-S218 to easily stream with low latency and higher quality sound than traditional Bluetooth.

4K HDMI with eARC
Send the audio from the streaming apps built into your smart TV to the sound bar with 4K UHD HDMI (1in / 1out with eARC) via the included HDMI cable. HDMI also supports VRR and ALLM.

Denon Dialog Enhancer
Denon Dialog Enhancer improves dialogue clarity with three different modes—ideal for movies and TV shows. Turn up the dialogue without having to adjust the overall volume.

Low-profile design and wall-mountable
At 2” (60mm) tall, the Denon DHT-S218 can be placed in front of your TV without blocking its bottom edge or can be easily mounted.

Easy setup and user experience
Quickly connect to your TV with the supplied HDMI. Once connected, you can seamlessly control the sound bar volume with your TV remote.

Sound modes for any occasion
With four different sound modes—Movie, Night, Music, and Pure—you can choose the perfect mode for any occasion.

Pure mode
Eliminates surround sound processing and other adjusted characteristics for pure music listening

Over 110 years of audio innovation

body_html:
LuminOS, pre-installed apps and more
Take full advantage of endless entertainment directly out of the box with all your favourite pre-installed apps. Enjoy Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, Disney+ and more!

Full HD 1080p images
Watch movies and more in Native Full HD 1080p high-definition sharpness, full of the fine detail that can be lost at lower resolutions. The picture remains lifelike and text is crystal-clear when displayed on wall, ceiling and more!

Multiple image correction options
Auto horizontal and vertical keystones and 4 corner correction automatically help eliminate crooked, distorted images for a perfectly proportioned picture even if the device is not straight in front of the wall. The auto-focus technology and digital zoom allow you to fine-tune pictures to your needs and place your projector at any distance.

Flexible Design
Break free from traditional viewing with the Philips NeoPix 230 Smart and its innovative 180-degree rotating stand. This feature invites you to redefine the boundaries of your entertainment - from hosting an intimate movie night under a starry ceiling in your bedroom to transforming your wall into a cinema. Rotate the device and just project on any white wall. Thanks to the auto focus and auto image adjustment, your image will always be straight!

Bedside lamp
Elevate your ambiance with NeoPix 230 Smart's built-in LED strip, which effortlessly morphs the device into a stylish warm white bedside lamp. Just a 180-degree rotation and a touch of brightness control transform your space, delivering soothing illumination even when the projector takes a rest. Your personal theatre and an elegant lamp - all in one.

Integrated speaker sound system
No need for extra sound systems thanks to the built-in omnidirectional speakers with unrivalled performance even in such a small package.

Key Features

Up to 80" in True FULL HD 1080p

LuminOS system features built-in apps, including NetFlix, Disney+, Prime Video & more

180° rotational stand, doubles as a wall or ceiling mount

Built-in stereo speakers

title: Sonos Sub Mini (White)
body_html:
More exhilarating home theatre
Unlock your entertainment experience when you pair Sub Mini with Beam or Ray. The 5 GHz WiFi connection enhances audio transmission speed so you can enjoy films, shows, and games with high-quality sound reliably synced with your TV.

More mesmerising music
Never miss a beat and hear more nuance in every note when you pair Sub Mini with One or One SL.

Core power
Within the acoustically-sealed cabinet, dual custom woofers generate the full-toned low frequencies of a much larger subwoofer. Advanced processing further enhances the bass response.

No buzz or rattle
Both woofers face inwards to create a force-cancelling effect that neutralises distortion.

Better bass for your space
Trueplay™ tuning technology adapts the bass for the unique acoustics of the room so it never sounds harsh, muddy, or flat — even if you place Sub Mini next to the wall.

Hides in plain sight
Elegant and compact, Sub Mini blends in beside your furniture and easily fits under a desk or table.

Connects wirelessly
Sub Mini connects to your system over WiFi, so you can place it wherever it fits and looks best in the room.

Plug, add, play
Just plug in the power cable, open the app, and follow a few simple instructions to add Sub Mini to your system.

Easy control
The volume automatically adjusts along with your paired soundbar or speaker. Use the Sonos app to customise the EQ and change the bass level to your preference.

Specifications

Amplifiers: 2 x Class-D digital amplifiers are perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
Woofers: Dual 6" woofers face inwards for a force-cancelling effect.
Architecture: Sealed cabinet neutralises distortion and enhances bass response.
Frequency Response: As low as 25 Hz
EQ: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub Mini and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble, and loudness.
Trueplay: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes your Sonos system. Supported iOS device required.
WiFi: Connect to WiFi with any 802.11a/b/g/n 2.4 or 5 GHz broadcast-capable router.
Ethernet: 10/100 port for hardwiring to your router
Voltage: 100-240V 50/60Hz internal power supply
Operating Temperature: 0°C to 40°C
System Requirements
WiFi: Internet connection
Power Source: Nearby electrical outlet
Sonos app: The latest generation of the Sonos app running on a compatible device
Dimensions (DxH)mm: 230 x 305
Weight: 6.35kg
